About.title: About Me
About.description:
I am an Information Systems student who has been interested in computers since I was young. I started to use computers a lot when I was in elementary school, and I later studied Software Engineering at SMK Telkom Purwokerto, where I learned basic programming.

At first, coding felt challenging, but over time I found it interesting because it requires logical thinking. I enjoy the process of solving problems and feel satisfied when the code finally works. I mainly use Python and Java, and I have also learned C#, PHP, and Flutter at a basic level.

Besides coding, I enjoy analyzing problems, thinking about system flows, and writing reports or documentation. I am quite familiar with SQL querying using MySQL for managing and analyzing data. When working on tasks, I am usually calm and detail oriented. I may work a bit slowly because I focus on details, but I try to make sure the results are accurate.

I learn new things quite quickly and can adapt to different people and environments. I am more quiet and observant, which helps me stay focused and responsible in my work. I am interested in System Analyst and Data Analyst roles, but I am also open to opportunities in programming.

I am looking for a collaborative and structured environment where I can continue learning and growing. I believe in working quietly and letting the results speak for themselves.
